answers.author: Dorian Kachur
answers.text:
For the past number of years, the City of Airdrie has conducted an annual Citizen Satisfaction Survey that enables citizens to rate services by importance and performance.  It also identifies the top concerns for residents.  Past Councils have placed high value on the survey when determining priorities and making budget decisions.

answers.text:
The City of Tempe conducts a yearly Community Attitude Survey yearly to assist Council with setting priorities, understanding the opinions of residents, developing strategic plans and preparing the budget. Attached is a copy of the 2010 results for your review. In addition we have maps that plot each question so that problem areas can be identified.

author: Tracy Miller
text:
Pinellas County, FL is endeavoring to gauge citizen opinion regarding the upcoming FY2012 budget.  The county plans to develop a phone survey that would allow citizens to list their budget preferences and prioritize the services provided by local government.    
The county is soliciting other counties/cities to see if anyone has similar surveys that can be shared.  
Please respond here or directly to tmiller@transformgov.org.  
Sincerely,  
Tracy Miller  
Florida Regional Director  
Alliance for Innovation
title: Budget Priority Citizen Phone Surveys
